title: Unable to create account on some devices with Android 6
body: # Bug Report ## Problem Can't create account on Samsung Galaxy phones (Android 6.0.0 only) - on last step of account creation application is crashed with error: ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) - Status version: nightly 06/12/2019 - Operating System: Android 6.0.0 (Samsung Galaxy) #### Logs Full logcat: [StatusIm-191104-162132-390c1a-pr-universal.apk_2019_11_6_13_31_32.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3814805/StatusIm-191104-162132-390c1a-pr-universal.apk_2019_11_6_13_31_32.log) [comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat) ``` 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): Unable to load library. 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: dlopen failed: "/data/app/com.google.android.webview-1/lib/arm/libwebviewchromium.so" is 32-bit instead of 64-bit 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary(Runtime.java:372) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1076) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at org.chromium.base.library_loader.LibraryLoader.a(PG:24) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at org.chromium.base.library_loader.LibraryLoader.a(PG:13) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at org.chromium.android_webview.AwBrowserProcess.a(PG:16) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.android.webview.chromium.WebViewChromiumFactoryProvider.a(PG:82) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.android.webview.chromium.WebViewChromiumFactoryProvider.(PG:12) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Native Method) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at android.webkit.WebViewFactory.getProvider(WebViewFactory.java:163) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at android.webkit.CookieManager.getInstance(CookieManager.java:39) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusModule.clearCookies(StatusModule.java:961) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaMethodWrapper.invoke(JavaMethodWrapper.java:372) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaModuleWrapper.invoke(JavaModuleWrapper.java:158) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.NativeRunnable.run(Native Method) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:739) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:95) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.MessageQueueThreadHandler.dispatchMessage(MessageQueueThreadHandler.java:29) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:158) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.MessageQueueThreadImpl$4.run(MessageQueueThreadImpl.java:232) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/cr_LibraryLoader( 1967): at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:818) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): error instantiating provider 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Native Method) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at android.webkit.WebViewFactory.getProvider(WebViewFactory.java:163) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at android.webkit.CookieManager.getInstance(CookieManager.java:39) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusModule.clearCookies(StatusModule.java:961) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaMethodWrapper.invoke(JavaMethodWrapper.java:372) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaModuleWrapper.invoke(JavaModuleWrapper.java:158) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.NativeRunnable.run(Native Method) 11-06 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:818) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Cannot load WebView 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at org.chromium.android_webview.AwBrowserProcess.a(PG:20) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at com.android.webview.chromium.WebViewChromiumFactoryProvider.a(PG:82) 11-06 13:31:08.112 E/WebViewFactory( 1967): at com.android.webview.chromium.WebViewChromiumFactoryProvider.(PG:12) ```
@rachelhamlin didn't include it in V1, because don't have info about how many users use Android 6.0.0 on Samsung Galaxy devices.
Only ~3% of our current beta installs, so we can leave this unprioritized.

App doesn't start on LG G5 Android 6.
Logcat: [StatusIm-200116-025900-5ab476-nightly-universal.apk_2020_1_16_11_11_0.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/4070858/StatusIm-200116-025900-5ab476-nightly-universal.apk_2020_1_16_11_11_0.log)
